ygData.subject: Re: Pred Base
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia met her at her room looking at the way she carried herself. Pick your head up, you can t let the troops see an unsure leader now can we? he intended

Phobia met her at her room looking at the way she carried 
herself. "Pick your head up, you can't let the troops see an unsure 
leader now can we?" he intended to keep pushing the word into her 
head until she was convinced. KitKat was the best candidate for the 
job since Darkmouse had disappeared. "You command well, you handled 
things devinely back there, you should be proud." The last part he'd 
meant he was impressed.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::KitKat:;
> 
> She walked back to the base and went straight to her room.
> She was confused and down hearted. She didn't know why, but she 
> wanted the Preds to be a glorious group and win the war with the 
> group intact.  She wondered why her other leaders never thoguht 
this 
> way and wondered if something was wrong with her for thinking like 
> this.
